verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1893>when<s%> he had <S%G4137>ended<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G4487>sayings<s%> in the <S%G189>audience<s%> of the <S%G2992>people,<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum.<s%>

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1543>centurion's<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G1784>dear<s%> to him, was <S%G2192>sick,<s%> <S%G2560><s%> and <S%G3195>ready<s%> to <S%G5053>die.<s%>

And when he <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> to him the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2065>beseeching<s%> him that he would <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G1295>heal<s%> his <S%G1401>servant.<s%>

And when they <S%G3854>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> they <S%G3870>sought<s%> him <S%G4705>instantly,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> That he was <S%G514>worthy<s%> for <S%G3739>whom<s%> he should <S%G3930>do<s%> <S%G5124>this:<s%>
For he <S%G25>loves<s%> our <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and he has <S%G3618>built<s%> us a <S%G4864>synagogue.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> with them. And when he was <S%G2235>now<s%> not <S%G3112>far<s%> from the <S%G3614>house,<s%> the <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G5384>friends<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4660>trouble<s%> not yourself: for I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G2425>worthy<s%> that you should <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> my <S%G4721>roof:<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> thought I <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G515>worthy<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you: but <S%G2036>say<s%> in a <S%G3056>word,<s%> and my <S%G3816>servant<s%> shall be <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

For I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5021>set<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> me <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%> and I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G5129>one,<s%> <S%G4198>Go,<s%> and he <S%G4198>goes;<s%> and to <S%G243>another,<s%> <S%G2064>Come,<s%> and he <S%G2064>comes;<s%> and to my <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G4160>Do<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> and he <S%G4238>does<s%> it.

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, he <S%G2296>marveled<s%> at him, and <S%G4762>turned<s%> him <S%G4762>about,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G3793>people<s%> that <S%G190>followed<s%> him, I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I have not <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3761>no,<s%> not in Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
And they that were <S%G3992>sent,<s%> <S%G5290>returning<s%> to the <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G5198>whole<s%> that had been <S%G770>sick.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1836>after,<s%> that he <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3484>Nain;<s%> and <S%G2425>many<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4848>went<s%> with him, and <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3793>people.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G1448>came<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> to the <S%G4439>gate<s%> of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G2348>dead<s%> man <S%G1580>carried<s%> out, the <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and she was a <S%G5503>widow:<s%> and <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> was with her.
And when the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> her, he had <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> her, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G2799>Weep<s%> not.

And he <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> the <S%G4673>bier:<s%> and they that <S%G941>bore<s%> him <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2476>still.<s%> And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3495>Young<s%> <S%G3495>man,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Arise. <S%G1453><s%>
And he that was <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G339>sat<s%> up, and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%> And he <S%G1325>delivered<s%> him to his <S%G3384>mother.<s%>

And there <S%G2983>came<s%> a <S%G5401>fear<s%> on <S%G537>all:<s%> and they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> That a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> is <S%G1453>risen<s%> up <S%G1722>among<s%> us; and, That <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1980>visited<s%> his <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>rumor<s%> of him <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G1722>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea,<s%> and <S%G1722>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4066>region<s%> <S%G4066>round<s%> <S%G4066>about.<s%>
And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G518>showed<s%> him of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> things.

And <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G4341>calling<s%> to him <S%G1417>two<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> sent them to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1488>Are<s%> you he that should <S%G2064>come?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4328>look<s%> we for <S%G243>another?<s%>

When the <S%G435>men<s%> were <S%G3854>come<s%> to him, they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G910>Baptist<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> us to you, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1488>Are<s%> you he that should <S%G2064>come?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4328>look<s%> we for <S%G243>another?<s%>

And in that <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> he <S%G2323>cured<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of their <S%G3554>infirmities<s%> and <S%G3148>plagues,<s%> and of <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits;<s%> and to <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G5185>blind<s%> he <S%G5483>gave<s%> <S%G991>sight.<s%>

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>Go<s%> your way, and <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> things you have <S%G1492>seen<s%> and <S%G191>heard;<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> that the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G308>see,<s%> the <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> the <S%G3015>lepers<s%> are <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> are <S%G1453>raised,<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> is preached. <S%G2097><s%>
And blessed is he, whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall not be <S%G4624>offended<s%> in me.

But <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> you out for to <S%G1492>see?<s%> A <S%G4396>prophet?<s%> <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, and <S%G4055>much<s%> <S%G4055>more<s%> than a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is he, of <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> my <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> your <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G2680>prepare<s%> your <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> you.

For I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1722>Among<s%> those that are <S%G1084>born<s%> of <S%G1135>women<s%> there is not a <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> than <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist:<s%> but he that is <S%G3398>least<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3187>greater<s%> than he.

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> that <S%G191>heard<s%> him, and the <S%G5057>publicans,<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> being <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John.<s%>

But the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G3544>lawyers<s%> <S%G114>rejected<s%> the <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> being not <S%G907>baptized<s%> of him.

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Whereunto<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall I <S%G3666>liken<s%> the <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation?<s%> and to <S%G5101>what<s%> are they like? <S%G3664><s%>

They are <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G3813>children<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in the <S%G58>marketplace,<s%> and <S%G4377>calling<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We have <S%G832>piped<s%> to you, and you have not <S%G3738>danced;<s%> we have <S%G2354>mourned<s%> to you, and you have not wept. <S%G2799><s%>

For <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drinking<s%> <S%G3631>wine;<s%> and you <S%G3004>say,<s%> He <S%G2192>has<s%> a devil. <S%G1140><s%>

The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking;<s%> and you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%> a <S%G5314>gluttonous<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> and a <S%G3630>drunkard,<s%> a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G5057>publicans<s%> and sinners! <S%G268><s%>
But <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> her children. <S%G5043><s%>

And <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2065>desired<s%> him that he would <S%G5315>eat<s%> with him. And he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisee's<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G347>sat<s%> <S%G347>down<s%> to meat.

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> in the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> was a <S%G268>sinner,<s%> when she <S%G1921>knew<s%> that Jesus <S%G345>sat<s%> <S%G345>at<s%> meat in the <S%G5330>Pharisee's<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2865>brought<s%> an <S%G211>alabaster<s%> <S%G211>box<s%> of <S%G3464>ointment,<s%>

And <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G3844>at<s%> his <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> him <S%G2799>weeping,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G1026>wash<s%> his <S%G4228>feet<s%> with <S%G1144>tears,<s%> and did <S%G1591>wipe<s%> them with the <S%G2359>hairs<s%> of her <S%G2776>head,<s%> and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G218>anointed<s%> them with the <S%G3464>ointment.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G2564>bidden<s%> him <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, he <S%G2036>spoke<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> man, <S%G1487>if<s%> he were a <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> would have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> and <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G4217>manner<s%> of <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> is that <S%G680>touches<s%> him: for she is a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> to <S%G2036>say<s%> to you. And he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> on.

There was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1157>creditor<s%> which <S%G1510>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5533>debtors:<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3784>owed<s%> <S%G4001>five<s%> <S%G4001>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>pence,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> fifty. <S%G4004><s%>

And when they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>nothing<s%> to <S%G591>pay,<s%> he <S%G5483>frankly<s%> <S%G5483>forgave<s%> them <S%G297>both.<s%> <S%G2036>Tell<s%> me <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> of them will <S%G25>love<s%> him most? <S%G4119><s%>

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G5274>suppose<s%> that he, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G5483>forgave<s%> <S%G4119>most.<s%> And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You have <S%G3723>rightly<s%> judged. <S%G2919><s%>

And he <S%G4762>turned<s%> to the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> and <S%G5346>said<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G991>See<s%> you <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1135>woman?<s%> I <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> you <S%G1325>gave<s%> me <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> for my <S%G4228>feet:<s%> but she has <S%G1026>washed<s%> my <S%G4228>feet<s%> with <S%G1144>tears,<s%> and wiped <S%G1591><s%> them with the <S%G2359>hairs<s%> of her head. <S%G2776><s%>

You <S%G1325>gave<s%> me <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5370>kiss:<s%> but <S%G3778>this<s%> woman <S%G575>since<s%> the time I <S%G1525>came<s%> in has not <S%G1257>ceased<s%> to <S%G2705>kiss<s%> my feet. <S%G4228><s%>
My <S%G2776>head<s%> with <S%G1637>oil<s%> you did not <S%G218>anoint:<s%> but <S%G3778>this<s%> woman has <S%G218>anointed<s%> my <S%G4228>feet<s%> with ointment. <S%G3464><s%>

Why <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5484><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Her <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G4183>many,<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven;<s%> for she <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G4183>much:<s%> but to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3641>little<s%> is forgiven, <S%G863><s%> the same <S%G25>loves<s%> little. <S%G3641><s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, Your <S%G266>sins<s%> are forgiven. <S%G863><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> Your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>saved<s%> you; <S%G4198>go<s%> in peace. <S%G1515><s%>
